scripts.bootstrap: yarn install$(test $CI && echo ' --frozen-lockfile') --network-concurrency 15 && lerna link && lerna run bootstrap && patch-package --patch-dir common/patch-package
scripts.docker:start: yarn docker-compose up --build -d && concurrently --raw "yarn docker-compose logs -f -t --tail=10" "yarn --silent wp-wait && yarn --silent docker:start:dev"
scripts.docker:start:dev: concurrently --raw "TS_NODE_PROJECT=common/tsconfig.json yarn parallel-webpack --no-stats --config common/webpack.multi.ts --watch" "WORKSPACE_COMMAND='IS_DOCKER_START_COMMAND=1 yarn dev' yarn --silent workspace:concurrently"
scripts.debug:php:start: yarn --silent wp-cli:root '(pecl list | grep xdebug || pecl install xdebug) && docker-php-ext-enable xdebug.so && /etc/init.d/apache2 reload'
scripts.docker-compose: PLUGIN_SLUGS=$(yarn --silent workspace:slugs) COMPOSE_PATH_SEPARATOR=: COMPOSE_FILE=./devops/docker-compose/docker-compose.yml:./devops/docker-compose/docker-compose.local.yml:$(COMPOSE_CONTEXT=local yarn --silent workspace:compose-files) COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=${npm_package_name} yarn --silent exposedotenv docker-compose
scripts.docker-compose:name: echo $(docker inspect -f '{{.Name}}' $(yarn --silent docker-compose --log-level ERROR ps -q ${DCOMPOSE_SERVICE_NAME}) | cut -c2-)
scripts.wp-cli: yarn --silent docker-compose$(test $CI && echo ':e2e' || echo ' --log-level ERROR') exec ${WP_CLI_CONTAINER_ARGS:='--user 33:33'} -T wordpress /bin/bash -c
scripts.wp-wait: timeout=500 docker exec -e REST_ENDPOINT=$(cd plugins && ls | head -1) ${WP_WAIT_CONTAINER:=$(yarn --silent docker-compose:name-wordpress)} bash -c 'while [ "$(curl --insecure -s -o /dev/null -w ''%{http_code}'' localhost/wp-json/$REST_ENDPOINT/v1/plugin)" != "200" ]; do sleep 2; done'
scripts.docker-compose:e2e: PLUGIN_SLUGS=$(yarn --silent workspace:slugs) COMPOSE_PATH_SEPARATOR=: COMPOSE_FILE=./devops/docker-compose/docker-compose.yml:./devops/docker-compose/docker-compose.e2e.yml:$(COMPOSE_CONTEXT=e2e yarn --silent workspace:compose-files) COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=${npm_package_name}-ci-${JOB_PACKAGE_NAME}-${CI_COMMIT_REF_SLUG} yarn --silent exposedotenv docker-compose --log-level ERROR
scripts.docker-compose:e2e:name: echo $(docker inspect -f '{{.Name}}' $(yarn --silent docker-compose:e2e ps -q ${DCOMPOSE_SERVICE_NAME}) | cut -c2-)
scripts.docker-compose:traefik: PLUGIN_SLUGS=$(yarn --silent workspace:slugs) COMPOSE_PATH_SEPARATOR=: COMPOSE_FILE=./devops/docker-compose/docker-compose.yml:./devops/docker-compose/docker-compose.traefik.yml:$(COMPOSE_CONTEXT=traefik yarn --silent workspace:compose-files) COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=${npm_package_name}-traefik-${CI_COMMIT_REF_SLUG} yarn --silent exposedotenv docker-compose --log-level ERROR
scripts.docker-compose:traefik:name: echo $(docker inspect -f '{{.Name}}' $(yarn --silent docker-compose:traefik ps -q ${DCOMPOSE_SERVICE_NAME}) | cut -c2-)
scripts.workspace:lint: eslint "common/**/*.{jsx,js,tsx,ts}" && ./packages/utils/vendor/bin/phpcs common/ --standard=./common/phpcs.xml && yarn --silent workspaces run lint
scripts.workspace:concurrently:
node -e "require('concurrently')('$(yarn --silent lerna list --all -p --loglevel silent | tr -s '
' ',')'.split(',').filter(Boolean).map(d => 'cd \'' + d + '\' && ' + process.env.WORKSPACE_COMMAND), { raw: true })"
scripts.workspace:compose-files: find plugins/*/devops packages/*/devops | grep "^\(plugins\|packages\)/.*/devops/docker-compose/docker-compose\.\(yml\|$COMPOSE_CONTEXT\)" | sed -n -e 'H;${x;s/\n/:.\//g;s/^ //;p;}' | sed -e 's/:*$//' | sed -e 's/^://'
scripts.preversion: (test "${CI_JOB_NAME}" != "semver"  && WORKSPACE_COMMAND="yarn --silent grunt composer:disclaimer" yarn --silent workspace:concurrently && lerna exec --concurrency 1 -- yarn grunt yarn:disclaimer && git add "*LICENSE_3RD_PARTY*") || :
